snippet: After being let go by Goldman Sachs, Matthew Marshall Taylor was hired by Morgan Stanley. On Thursday, the C.F.T.C. filed an enforcement action against the trader.
abstract: After being let go by Goldman Sachs, Matthew Marshall Taylor was hired by Morgan Stanley. On Thursday, the C.F.T.C. filed an enforcement action against the trader.

headline.main: Despite a Regulatory Black Mark, Trader Landed at Morgan Stanley
